You'll probably get a good kick out of this game in the first ten or twenty rounds...

After that, the matchmaking throws you to the wolves, rendering you completely helpless against the anemic basement-dwellers who treat the game like it's a full time job with a salary plus benefits.

In other words, the game was no longer fun for me when I reached somewhere around gold rank.

Playing since 2016.
The worst update they did since the release of the game. Don't play the game at this state

Dead by daylight is an extremely fun game. The devs are still extremely involved in the game, even 8 years later. Sometimes the calls they make are questionable, but they're as quick to fix them as fast a dedicated and passionate team can. Will admit, the community can be a bit toxic, but it can also be absolutely amazing. I have almost a hundred hours in this game, and I will play for many more.

**Want to add an edit after looking at a lot of the negative reviews for this game.
-Every update you're going to see a chunk of people say "They ruined the game." These people are sweaty and their meta got nerfed. You'll usually see they still play the game quite a bit.
-As an almost exclusive killer main, I've never had a bot problem
-Matchmaking DOES kind of suck as a survivor. I've gotten games where the survivor team was comprised of people who I'm sure stream the game for a living playing with people who had likely never played a video game in their life.
-The game does have a pretty solid learning curve, and the lack of practice mode doesn't help
I got into a match against a trickster

Full of bots. Impossible to get a game with real-life people which completely defeats the object of the game and makes it just the biggest waste of time and money.
what a disappointment...

Fun game. Definitely worth getting on sale.
Bill + Urban Evasion + Left Behind + Locker abuse = Vietnam Simulator. 10/10, would play again.

This is some of the best fun you can have as a horror fan, even if you hate scary things its still amazing, although the community can be pretty gross at times its still some of the best fun you can have online
This game is pretty good. It's not my type of game though, so I only play it once in a blue moon

A  really entertaining and fun game. It is definitely worth the money. I am not sure if this is horror or not, but if it is... I think it's a perfect amount for those who are scared easily. You very easily get used to the spook, and it's really not that bad. I personally prefer it, because I am not a fan of horror. It's fun to play as killer as well, however a tad bit more advanced. You can learn quick! The currency is pretty cheap, which makes it pretty easy to get new characters to play. Not to mention, they have a great variety of them. They are all fun in their different way, and you just gotta find the one you like. I'd absolutely recommend this game. It's a little bit of survival and a little bit of horror. It's fun both alone and with friends, and communication isn't needed for a win. ğŸ‘ğŸ‘

es una chulada de juego papa

Ill just begin by saying after 500 plus hours I can give a full review and say I am addicted to this ever evolving game, newest patch was a struggle but with changes to my survivor builds I can successfully escape matches again of course it is all luck of the draw though but I love Dead by Daylight as it constantly challenges me with the new chapters and new perks killers and survivors get!

I would totally recommend if your looking for a constant challenge this game is for you then.

juego de mierda mas pay to win no puede ser, me gaste 400 pesos en este juego y aun asi tengo que pagar para comprar personajes chetados. Simplemente no te conviene pagar por eso si despues tenes que volver a pagar para tener un personaje mejor una cagada de juego y encima no lo puedo rembolsar porque jugue mas de 2 horas gordos demierda
buen juego, falta balanceo y menos lloriqueo de los jugadores
ive played it a lil bit. its ok
GREAT FUN GAME WORTH EVERY HOUR!

There are a lot of asymmetrical horror games out there and more coming all the time, but none have proved themselves like DBD has IMO. The devs continue to make pretty questionable buff/nerf decisions at times, but overall the game continues to improve, content is steady and core gameplay is addictive.

This game is ultimately frustrating, annoying, infuriating and mentally destructive at times. This is one of the most toxic games that have ever existed. But somehow it's really satisfying when you set things right... so good luck pushing through the inhumanly high learning wall.
Great game, would recommend you get it if you dont have it already,
#1 Kate Denson Stan!!! stream boil over on apple music

this is one of my most favorite games of all time. it's fun and exhilarating, and extremely nerve-wracking in a way that makes you want to keep playing. though sometimes the hitboxes are ass, other than that it's a really great game and if you're contemplating getting it, just get it.
